description: Bighead knapweed (Centaurea macrocephala) is an amazing plant species because of its resilience. It is known for its long lasting blooms of vibrant purple flowers, which may last up to three months. This amazing plant species is also drought and cold tolerant, making it an ideal choice for gardeners in climates with extreme weather conditions. It's beneficial for soil health and is a critical food source for many beneficial insects. Additionally, its deep roots help to aerate the soil and prevent soil erosion. Bighead knapweed is an amazing species that is an asset to any garden!
